text: Approval for QVCAD System (Version 3.3). The QVCAD System is indicated for use as an aid to the reader during screening procedures in searching images of female breasts produced by the somov and Invenia Automated Breast Ultrasound Systems (screening mammography BIRADS Assessment Category 1 or 2, and BI-RADS Composition/Density c or d) to detect mammography-occult lesions in regions not known to have suspicious findings. The indicators produced by the QVCAD System are not intended to be used for diagnostic characterization of suspicious findings.
